titleStmt.title: Episcopacy and Presbytery considered according to the severall respects, which may commend a church-government, and oblige good Christians to it.
titleStmt.author: Ferne, H. (Henry), 1602-1662.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Henry Ferne. cf. NUC pre-1956.
